metadata.name: Renamed Jusched.EXE Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of a renamed "jusched.exe" as seen used by the cobalt group

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (lower(LOWER(device.desc)) in ('java update scheduler', 'java(tm) update scheduler')) AND NOT endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\jusched.exe')))

output.summary: Detects the execution of a renamed "jusched.exe" as seen used by the cobalt group
